page.title: 16Facts About Ayrshire Metal P
page.content: THese are the answers to the questions we asked Peter Ramsdon of Ayrshire Metal PRoducts : There are 108 people employed in Metal Trim roughly. The factory has been opened 11 years from 1974. There are 54 offices in the factory. Outside salesmen have increased over the last 12months. Metal Trim have just finished another floor. The size of the factory now is 102 m. in length and 80m. wide. In Metal Trim most of the workers live in Daventry . The function of Metal Trim is to produce Z purling for the building industry. Metal Trim deals with France, Germany and they also export to the northern Middle East countries.
